ZLib (MSVC)

Download

  • Download http://www.zlib.net/zlib-1.2.7.tar.gz

Project

  • Open %SOURCE_HOME%/projects/visualc6/zlib.dsw

Project Options

  • C/C++, Language, wchar_t : Yes
  • C/C++, Code Generation, Runtime library : Multi-threaded

Compile

  • Build LIB Release

Install

  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/zlib.h to Shared/Include/ZLib/zlib.h
  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/zconf.h to Shared/Include/ZLib/zconf.h
  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/projects/visualc6/Win32_LIB_Release/zlib to Shared/Library/MSVC/ZLib.lib
